body:
僕の妖怪パレード

Hello everyone! This is a blog for Boku no Youkai Parade, a Japanese demon themed BnHA zine. We’ll be holding an interest check soon, but feel free to follow us for more information and updates!

blog.name: botrom-u1
blog.title: BOTROM - U1
blog.description: CC for TS4 from anime and video games. Requests are stopped right now, just out of time

title: Upcoming MHA content for TS4
body:
Hi there everyone! As many of you may know, a new BNHA game was released recently, and that means new 3D models for me to extract and convert to TS4 for you. I still haven’t finished those uniforms as I’ve been traveling and also I had got a pretty bad flu, but they’ll have to wait as this is a bigger chance. So I’m back to work and I’ve already downloaded the game and extracted the models. I can swear it’ll be possible to convert the models from the game to your sims and those are pretty good news!

Well, I’m posting a list with every character of BNHA I’d like to convert. Anyways, I don’t have much time so I don’t know how long it will take, sorry if I take too much. I’d like to convert their hairstyles as that’s the main part of them, and then, if I have time enough, also convert their outfits. I was about to finish their uniforms, but that will need to wait. Well, here it is!

To be precise, I’m listing them:
- Midoriya, Bakugo, Todoroki, Kaminari, Kirishima and All-Might, as we already had (Sadly, there’s no model of the “other” All-might in this game). All of them look quite well and better than before, but Kaminari’s one looks a bit weird.
- Iida, Ochaco, Tsuyu, Jiro, Momo and Shigaraki (Ups, I forgot to add him to this picture, he’s in the next one) in a new version as well. I could have converted them before, but I didn’t have time. (They look nice too)
- Dabi, Aizawa, Toga, All for One (Helmet) and Inasa coming brand new! They weren’t in the previous game so this new one is giving us the chance to convert them.

But that’s not all!

(Here’s Tomura) Now, some special ones: Tokoyami is joining us too! Even if it sounds impossible, it wouldn’t be the first time I do something like that. If you already know my content, you know what I mean. I’ll try to rig it and make his mouth and eyes move, but I’m not sure if I’ll be able to get it. Anyways, just the head would be enough. Stain and Muscular are possible to convert too, but I’m not sure if anyone’s interested in them so I’m not converting them until someone requests them. And the same goes for Endeavor, but adding that his texture is shit and even if I retexture it it will remain looking pretty weird. And, yes, Gran Torino… with this BIG guy we have two chances: making him a child with his looking (but acting like a child, requesting for betdime stories, going to school and having the voice of a 10 years old child) or making him an elder with the height of any other sim. You decide.

Here you have a nearer view of some of them. I bet you’re going to like them really much! (You can open the picture in a new tab to see it better) Also there are a few items in the game that I’ll try to extract, like Ojiro’s tail, Overhaul’s mask, Kota’s hat and more. I’ll list them soon and wait for you to request them.

And finally, I’d like to know which one you like the most or you’re more excited about and to set an order for converting them based on it, so I’m posting soon I’ve already posted a poll where I’d like you to vote for the one you want first. You can find it here. Also, feel free to direct message me whenever you want, I’ll be glad to receive any comment or message from you!

(At this link you can find the same post with higher quality pictures)

summary: Headcanon for a fic I don’t have time to write: Eri gets into UA via a recommendation from Dadzawa and on the first day of...
body:
Headcanon for a fic I don’t have time to write: Eri gets into UA via a recommendation from Dadzawa and on the first day of school All Might sends Izuku a picture of her in her school uniform.

Izuku cries.

summary: OKAY since you write for BNHA May I request some Neito Monoma and Shouto Todoroki relationship hcs with so thats in the same...
question: OKAY since you write for BNHA May I request some Neito Monoma and Shouto Todoroki relationship hcs with so thats in the same class as them! Thanks boo!!
answer:
You ARE LITERALLY WELCOME. YOU KNOW HOW MUCH I WANNA WRITE ABOUT THOSE 1B KIDZZZ?! I am really excited to cover some Monoma content and to also introduce my followers to some MHA stuff! If you like it, love, then let me know and request more! Love writing your requests! <3 - Medinah 

Shouto Todoroki 

  • Shouto isn’t very public about personal matters, but he makes it a habit to make sure to eat lunch with his s/o. After class, he will hang back until his s/o is done packing up and walk behind everyone while asking them if they are hungry and what they would like to eat. 
  • The charms and bookmarks you’ll find his s/o using are all gifts from him. He likes to gift them little things that will remind them he is always there. 
  • They walk to school in the mornings, usually meeting midway. Shouto likes to smell their hair and his s/o likes to hold his hand until they get near the school entrance. 
  • The library is one of their frequent places for studying and generally spending time in private during school hours or after school. 
  • In the classes where Shouto has a good view of them, he finds himself staring at his s/o and getting lost in the sight of them. When s/o spots him, they smile and literally melt his icy heart. 
  • Will immediately speed towards his s/o to be their partner during practical exercises or demonstrations in class. 
  • Once kissed his s/o in the equipment storage room because he felt a little impulsive. His s/o was so shocked but still really happy that Shouto openly wanted affection, regardless of the scenario. 

Neito Monoma 

  • He has no interest in hiding his lovely, gorgeous s/o. “You might think you’re better than us, 1-A, but you definitely don’t have someone as amazing as my s/o. You might as well start bowing down right now…”
  • Backhugs them whenever he can, snuggling to them even in school! The boy is hungry for physical affection, not that his s/o complains. 
  • Treats them like royalty and buys them the best drinks from the vending machine. Always makes sure to pile their plate up with food because he wants their tummy to be full with food. He is actually such a cute lover. 
  • Neito loves passing notes to his s/o in class, despite the risk. Somehow gets away with it every time. Sometimes the note is just asking for the answer to a question, which is even more funny. 
  • Neito loves getting kisses on the cheek, and always cheekily asks for them when no-one is looking. S/o gives them because they just can’t resist his smile when he asks. 
  • They walk home together but they never go straight home without visit department stores or eating out. Neito loves to prolong any moment with his s/o as much as he can.

  • In the classes where Shouto has a good view of them, he finds himself staring at his s/o and getting lost in the sight of them. When s/o spots him, they smile and literally melt his icy heart. 
  • Will immediately speed towards his s/o to be their partner during practical exercises or demonstrations in class. 
  • Once kissed his s/o in the equipment storage room because he felt a little impulsive. His s/o was so shocked but still really happy that Shouto openly wanted affection, regardless of the scenario. 

Neito Monoma 

  • He has no interest in hiding his lovely, gorgeous s/o. “You might think you’re better than us, 1-A, but you definitely don’t have someone as amazing as my s/o. You might as well start bowing down right now…”
  • Backhugs them whenever he can, snuggling to them even in school! The boy is hungry for physical affection, not that his s/o complains. 
  • Treats them like royalty and buys them the best drinks from the vending machine. Always makes sure to pile their plate up with food because he wants their tummy to be full with food. He is actually such a cute lover. 
  • Neito loves passing notes to his s/o in class, despite the risk. Somehow gets away with it every time. Sometimes the note is just asking for the answer to a question, which is even more funny. 
  • Neito loves getting kisses on the cheek, and always cheekily asks for them when no-one is looking. S/o gives them because they just can’t resist his smile when he asks. 
  • They walk home together but they never go straight home without visit department stores or eating out. Neito loves to prolong any moment with his s/o as much as he can.

summary: "The people in this world who can smile are always the strongest." 💜💛 Chihiro met Nana as a middle schooler, but still doesn’t...
caption:
“The people in this world who can smile are always the strongest.” 💜💛

Chihiro met Nana as a middle schooler, but still doesn’t know the full story about what happened to her since it’s a bit of sensitive subject. Still, she tries to keep her legacy alive by encouraging All Might to smile!

These two definitely won “cutest couple” in the yearbook though, just saying.

summary: At least on fanfiction net, there’s The Sacred Torch Origins, which is basically an origin story of sorts for the individual One...
question: At least on fanfiction net, there’s The Sacred Torch Origins, which is basically an origin story of sorts for the individual One For All users, uncluding Uncle OFA himself. There’s also it’s spin off The Sacred Torch: Return, which has Izuku being OFA’s reincarnation and having his memories. Neither of these operate under the Dad for One theory though.
answer: Ah interesting! I haven’t found an Uncle for All fic! Will look at thank you!!!!!!!

summary: Do you think AFO would refuse to use Izuku's hero name since he sees it as just an insult and somehow accepting being in the...
question: Do you think AFO would refuse to use Izuku's hero name since he sees it as just an insult and somehow accepting being in the hero system?
answer: Hmm, I can see more AFO not using his hero name in a show of stubbornness in that he DIDN’T want Izuku to be a hero in the first place. Deku is an insult now reclaimed by Izuku, that name doesn’t hurt him anymore. AFO might take offense to what happened in the past but he’s more upset about whats going on in the present

summary: You’ve mentioned liking chaotic evil!Izuku way more than any suave, put-together evil!Izuku. If you haven’t seen simkjrs villian...
question: You’ve mentioned liking chaotic evil!Izuku way more than any suave, put-together evil!Izuku. If you haven’t seen simkjrs villian (kind of) Izuku on Tumblr, I highly, HIGHLY recommend you check it out. Bonus: the tag name is “the villain!izuku comedy that we all need but don’t deserve”
answer: I love everything simkjrs has ever done. I like their villain Izuku in a more cracky amusing kind of way but I’ve still laughed my ass off at it. As far as their writing is concerned, I love Izuku’s bitter, nihilistic approach to crime in know what I’ve made by the marks on my hands
